II.iii.3.B.3.b
.
Information Required to Verify Military Service
To properly verify active military service, the following information must be available:
entered on date (EOD)
date of release from active duty (RAD)
branch of service
character of service, and
separation reason.
Note
:  When available, include the claimant's service number when entering service information in VBMS.
References
:  For more information on
verifying military service in VBMS, see the
VBMS Core User Guide
, and
handling cases involving a former service member with an uncharacterized separation from service, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.B
.
